entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove HttpHeaderValueCollection<T>._specialValue field #63054
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not check for Transfer-Encoding: chunked on response properly #63053
  • Improve efficiency of parsing of Transfer-Encoding: chunked on HTTP/1.1 response #63052
  • Remove HttpHeaderValueCollection<T>._validator field #63050
  • Improve handling of multi-valued typed headers #63049
  • Simple Hello World app exits with 'Invalid runtimeconfig.json' on OSv #63048
  • Consider atomizing header names in HttpHeaders and elsewhere #63047
  • Use Huffman encoding for pre-generated HPACK and QPACK header names #63046
  • Invalid currency symbol for German and Chinese culture in Blazor WASM application #63045
  • [API Proposal]: Add public Architecture enum value for LoongArch64 #63042
  • [debugger][wasm] Check if Runtime.GetProperties works for structures with getters #63041
  • Non-Seekable SubReadStream should not support the Length property. #63040
  • [API Proposal]: Provide public OOB converters for System.Text.Json #63039
  • Unify semantics of `cpblk` and `initblk` of zero size between Mono and CoreCLR #63038
  • [System.Net.Http.Json] HttpRequestException is not thrown by HttpClient.GetFromJsonAsync when recieving a 204 No Content Response #63037
  • how can I add project reference output to sub folder #63036
  • Support language input keys #63034
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\gc_poll\\InsertGCPoll\\InsertGCPoll.cmd #63033

Closed

  • ANSICodePage returns zero for Traditional_Spanish_CI_AS collation #61977
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer throws AccessViolationException for struct with field initializers #62983
    7.0.0
  • How to use dotnet.js outside of browser? #61083
    7.0.0
  • [Perf][Mono][Interpreter] Regression in Call Benchmarks #63029
  • Proposal: AppContext.SetData #47922
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Display custom accessors the same way as in Console Application #62774

PullRequests

Created

  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Reduce size of HttpHeaderValueCollection #63057
    area-System.Net.Http
  • disable failing HTTP3 interop test #63055
    area-System.Net.Http
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't create multiple large files at the same time #63032
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, test enhancement, 6.0.x
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/tailcall tests and make them mergeable #63031
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #62989
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Expose AppContext.SetData in ref assembly #62996
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Run getter using Runtime.GetProperties #62857
    area-Debugger-mono
  • More static in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #63017
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Update ObjWriter package #63035
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix HAVE_PTHREAD_CONDATTR_SETCLOCK detection on Android #62978
    area-System.Threading

Updated

  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove unnecessary assignment of a value to local variables in SPC #63020
    area-System.Runtime
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1523074 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Cleanup copy/pasted assembly update test projects #62970
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Tweak set timeout #62898
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
  • [release/6.0] Use Ubuntu 18.04 and dotnet-buildtools-prereq docker images for enterprise linux pipeline #63014
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal and libunwind directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Divide properties into: public, private, protected. #62627
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-inc,gc, ToolBox directory. #62886
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62816
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Do not run Vector version of Hardware Intrinsics when AVX2… #62951
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not create non-null assertions from location nodes #62743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete some null checks #63024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message (#62894) #63012
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool install --local takes .config/nuget.config instead of nuget.config in current working directory #23135
  • Packing project with multiple frameworks skip content files #23127

PullRequests

Updated

  • Respect opt-outs from dotnet/msbuild#7008 #22719
  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Always available extension methods #4029

  • Open question for semi-auto properties #5563

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider removing BackgroundParser and/or BackgroundCompiler #58451
  • ExpressionCompilerTestBase.CreateMethodContext should support setting LanguageVersion #58449
  • Add perf related integration tests for diagnostics #58445
  • IAsyncEnumerable codegen doesn't properly cleanup after end of iteration which causes memory leaking #58444
  • Inline diagnostic tags are oddly rendered if there's linked files involved #58443
  • Remove obsolete TS and F# external APIs once they are updated #58442

Closed

  • VS2022 Release: Blazor code behind class wrong parenthesis refactoring in C# compiler directive #57768
    17.1
  • VS2019-Debugger produces high CPU (depending on CancellationTokens?) #44009
    Backlog
  • ConvertNamespaceCommandHandler performs an unexpected Format Document operation #58078
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve support for TestWorkspace with source generated files #58455
    Area-IDE
  • set compilers.sln as the default solution when opening with VS Code #58454
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove BackgroundParser and BackgroundCompiler #58453
    Area-IDE
  • Report level 7 name warning for `record` when langversion is below 9 #58452
    Area-Compilers
  • Update proximity expression tests to cover top level statements #58450
    Area-IDE
  • Try to find a test that fails when OnDiagnosticsUpdated changes #58439
    Area-IDE
  • Try to find a test that fails when SaveToInMemoryStorageAsync changes #58438
    Area-Analyzers
  • Try to find a test that fails when GetProjectStateDiagnosticsAsync changes #58437
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix setting InBreakState flag #58436
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Use ElasticSpace instead of ElasticZeroSpace #58152
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix leak in _hostAnalyzerStateMap #58406
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update 'convert namespace' to only 'dedent' file contents, not format them. #58434
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove weak-refs to the compilation (without generated docs) in the compilation tracker. #58425
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused message argument #58432
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Nullable analysis for Conditional/ObjectCreation conversions working through a delegates. #58420
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Required modifier parsing #58431
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix incremental build failures #58429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts. #58433
    Area-Interactive

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Input Not Giving Up Focus on First Click Outside of It #39145
  • Same type claims are merged when they get to the client side #39144
  • Perf regression: plaintext #39143
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #39142
  • BackgroundService StopAsync not called when stopping Web App in Azure using ASP.NET Core 6 Minimal API #39139
  • Blazor WASM SEO issues #39137
  • using IClaimsTransformation on-demand #39134
  • A lone semicolon in the using section cause aspnet not to execute #39133
  • Advanced NewtonsoftJson parsing error handling #39132
    Backlog
  • Downloading large files in Blazor WASM - memory leak? #39131

Closed

  • System.BadImageFormatException raised at random in deployed Azure App Service #38609
  • Debugging Blazor WASM in VSCode Holds Debug Session and Ports Open #38382
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor WASM] error boundary throw exception. #39109
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, multiple_queries #33165
  • Published size improvement: json #32973
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, plaintext_nodejs #32911
  • Perf regression: updates #32878
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #32877

  • Performance difference: proxy-yarp #32488
  • Performance difference: fortunes, updates, fortunes, fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries ... #32486
  • Performance difference: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext, plaintext, proxy-yarp #32167
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclose #36046
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_nodejs, fortunes_nodejs, json_nodejs #36874
  • Startup improvement: single_query #36671
  • Startup regression: json, plaintext #35627
  • Startup regression: connectionclose, endpoint, fortunes, fortunes_ef #35626
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef #33029
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, multiple_queries, plaintext #32915
  • Startup improvement: caching, connectionclose, connectionclose, fortunes #32914
  • Startup improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #32746
  • Startup improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json, updates #32715
  • Startup improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, https, json #32714
  • Startup regression: caching, caching, connectionclosehttps, endpoint #32712
  • Startup regression: mapaction #36981
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #37935
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #37936
  • Startup improvement: fortunes, multiple_queries, mvc #37938
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext_nodejs, single_query #37950
  • Startup regression: mapaction #38169
  • Startup improvement: connectionclose #38324
  • Startup regression: caching #38404
  • Perf improvement: caching #36911
  • Use edge for blazorwasm config by default #33088
    7.0-preview1
  • Razor views generated during a BeforeBuild target are not compiled into the assembly #39068
  • Whether the TimeOnly.ToDateTime method is missing this #39135
  • Perf regression: fortunes #39051
  • SignalR Reconnection after Disconnection unwires existing event handlers #39118

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove OPT_NO_FTS/LTS #39141
    area-infrastructure
  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.32
  • Update branding to 2.1.32 & merge internal commits #39029
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.32
  • Add support for GitHub Codespaces prebuilds #38793
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix new lines for SourceBuild #39130
    area-security, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor, .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No maui project template in VS 2022 Version 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 #3822
  • Occasional endless maui project creation in VS 2022 Version 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 #3821
  • VisualElement Focused, Unfocused, and SizeChanged events aren't getting fired. #3820
  • [Bug] Tapgesture not working in iOS and MacCatalyst #3819

PullRequests

Created

  • [core] remove Try/AddHandlers() APIs for linker-friendliness #3825
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [controls] Brush.Foo should return immutable instances #3824
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Remove layout resolution #3818

Merged

  • [core] cleanup PropertyMapper.PopulateKeys() #3823
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Listview handler via `Compatibility.ViewRenderer` #3817
    do-not-merge
  • [iOS] Add AutoresizingMask to WindowOverlay GraphicsView #3804
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Look into disabling the logging IsEnabled check #27054
  • Hoiw do I find which entity (or entities) are throwing a circular dependency when reinitialising a scaffokd? #27053
  • How to remove Entity Framework 6, and only use Entity Framework Core? #27051

Closed

  • Owned entity with compound key #26984
  • Fluent API : property.HasMinLength() #27052
  • Are you using (and how do you use) the Entity Framework Designer/EDMX? #25248
    Discussions
  • Owned Entity Type fields not getting mapped to database #27040

PullRequests

Created

  • Grinding the gears of war #27055
